parameters.text:
=I'm running an online store for ceramics.
Please come up with 5 ideas for a topic for a short social media marketing post.
Primarily adjust it to the current season, considering the current month (Today is {{ $today.format('dd/LL/yyyy') }}) and our customers are in the northern hemisphere.

Come up with a background scenery (e.g. beach, city, park, garden, cabin, office,...), a specific situation (e.g. picnic, day at the beach, party, regular office day,..) and a target audience (e.g. families, party singles, outdoor couples,startups,..)

assignments.name: prompt

parameters.content:
## 1. Generate campaign ideas
We ask the LLM to generate ideas for our upcoming marketing campaign based on the current date/season.
In gotoHuman we choose our favorite and approve.
![Source example](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6605a2979ff17b2cd1939cd4/6877ff9cd93f480ff6eb4def_677c04b5cd6a77eb434526bf9c0eaaca_gotoHuman%20full%20logo.svg)

## 2. Generate tag line (self-improving) & pick settings for image generation
We are going to place a text label (tag line) on top of our video and we ask AI to generate it for us.
To **allow our workflow to learn over time**, we are fetching previously approved tag lines from gotoHuman to incl. in our prompt as positive examples.

In gotoHuman we edit the scenery of the image, pick the desired style and product to show. We can also manually edit the tag line OR ask AI to retry (we can change the prompt as well)
![Source example](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6605a2979ff17b2cd1939cd4/6877ff9cd93f480ff6eb4def_677c04b5cd6a77eb434526bf9c0eaaca_gotoHuman%20full%20logo.svg)

## 3. Generate reference product image
Using the approved settings we ask Fal.ai to generate the image that our short video clip will be based on.
We then use Cloudinary to put the tag line as a boxed label on top of it.
In gotoHuman, we check the image and can ask for a retry. Clicking the chat button allows us to edit the prompt before retrying which is very useful with images.
![Source example](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6605a2979ff17b2cd1939cd4/6877ff9cd93f480ff6eb4def_677c04b5cd6a77eb434526bf9c0eaaca_gotoHuman%20full%20logo.svg)

## 5. Post to social media
We receive the URL of the final human-approved video clip in the response from gotoHuman and can now use it to publish it.
Alternatively, you can download the video clip from gotoHuman and post it manually.
![Source example](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6605a2979ff17b2cd1939cd4/6877ff9cd93f480ff6eb4def_677c04b5cd6a77eb434526bf9c0eaaca_gotoHuman%20full%20logo.svg)
![Source example](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6605a2979ff17b2cd1939cd4/6877ff9cd93f480ff6eb4def_677c04b5cd6a77eb434526bf9c0eaaca_gotoHuman%20full%20logo.svg)

## 4. Turn image into video clip
We use Fal.ai again to generate a short video clip based on our reference image, basically making it more vivid.
Again, we use Cloudinary to put the tag line on top of the video.
In gotoHuman, we check the video and again, can ask for a retry (also allowing prompt edits)
![Source example](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6605a2979ff17b2cd1939cd4/6877ff9cd93f480ff6eb4def_677c04b5cd6a77eb434526bf9c0eaaca_gotoHuman%20full%20logo.svg)

assignments.name: video

## ⚠️ Instructions
[ ] Select your gotoHuman credentials from the list

[ ] Select review template "Review Clip" from list

parameters.content:
## Create AI product videos with Fal.ai using [gotoHuman](https://www.gotohuman.com) for supervision
Let's say we are a shop selling ceramics and want to showcase one of our products on social media each week.
This mainly demonstrates how to use **gotoHuman** to supervise each step of the workflow.

@[youtube](mjjkPjCubns)

### ⚠️ How to set up
[ ] In n8n, install gotoHuman node **before** importing this template or some settings will be missing (Just add the node to a blank canvas before importing)

[ ] Create gotoHuman account, copy API key

[ ] In gotoHuman, import review templates from IDs: `Z7V1jyImY1pho9eY039R,0GBaOCWd27tqV562kkCL,E2wlCVPWmk2UnLHVt4uu,DitPdbIapS4rBxBTIYGt,Z2T7nFwkXVFQlD6z50eV`
(copy&paste this whole comma-separated list of IDs)
![x](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6605a2979ff17b2cd1939cd4/689484a8c752885e94ef212e_import-menu.JPG)
[ ] Follow further instructions in the yellow notes below

### Requirements
- gotoHuman account for human supervision
- OpenAI account for ideation and tag line generation
- Fal.ai account for image/video generation
- Cloudinary account for adding a text layer on top of image/video

### How to customize
- Adjust/Replace the workflow triggers as needed
- Change the prompt in the topics generation node
- Replace the product image URLs used in the "gotoHuman - Content" node
- Adjust the available styles for image generation in the gotoHuman review template and the prompts they link to in the "Set Initial Image Prompt" node
- Remove Cloudinary if you do not need a text overlay
- Adjust the prompt used for video generation in the "Set Initial Video Prompt" node

## ⚠️ Instructions
[ ] Select your gotoHuman credentials from the list

[ ] Select review template "Review Ref Image" from list

## ⚠️ Instructions
[ ] You need a Fal.ai account
[ ] Choose "Generic Credential Type" > "Header Auth" > Name: `Authorization`, Value: `Key YOUR-API-KEY`

## ⚠️ Instructions
[ ] You need a cloudinary.com account
[ ] In Cloudinary, find your environment/cloud name
[ ] In Cloudinary, [add an upload preset](https://console.cloudinary.com/settings/upload/presets). Enter a name, set signing mode to **Unsigned** and enter asset folder name. Leave rest as is. Save.
[ ] In this node, enter names of environment and upload preset (no credential req.)

## ⚠️ Instructions
[ ] Select your gotoHuman credentials from the list

[ ] Select review template "Product,..." from list

## ⚠️ Instructions
[ ] Select credential type "gotoHuman API"

[ ] Select your gotoHuman credentials from the list

[ ] For `formId` enter the ID of your gotoHuman review template "Product,..."

## ⚠️ Instructions
[ ] Add the webhook URL shown in this node to the settings of the review template "Create Campaign" in gotoHuman

## ⚠️ Instructions
[ ] Add gotoHuman credentials with your API key

[ ] Select review template "Topic Ideas" from list

_metadata.name: Generate AI Promo Videos for Products with GPT-4o, Fal.ai & Human Supervision
